metadata.name: Import Prompt Unchanged
metadata.shortDescription: Import existing prompts as-is into OLAF without modifications
metadata.description: Import one or multiple existing prompts into OLAF framework preserving their exact content and structure. Single prompts are added to my-prompts competency, multiple prompts create a new user-named competency. No conversion or modification - pure preservation with OLAF discoverability benefits.
objectives: Import prompts without any content modification
Preserve original prompt structure and functionality exactly
Import all referenced files (templates, tools, data, etc.)
Maintain file dependencies and relative paths
Add OLAF metadata layer for discoverability
metadata.author: Gee Team

prompts.name: import-prompt-unchanged
prompts.description: Main prompt for importing existing prompts unchanged
